text:
In removeAttribute(String name, int scope), the case statement for 
REQUEST_SCOPE is missing a break statement, causing it to fall through to the 
SESSION_SCOPE case which removes the attribute from the session as well.  This 
is especially problematic if there is no session as it causes an exception.

NOTE:  This is also a bug in 3.X versions of Tomcat.
Added missing break for REQUEST_SCOPE case. Fixed in Tomcat 4.0.
